ontopoly.sysmodel
Class OntopolyRepository

java.lang.Object
  ontopoly.sysmodel.OntopolyRepository

public class OntopolyRepository
extends Object

INTERNAL: Represents the system topic map describing all the topic maps in the Ontopoly topic maps repository.
